creator: jens.vdfecht@gmx.de
text:
When doing a
<p4change description="just some test"/>
on Windows XP, the task hangs. Starting Ant in verbose mode reveals, that 
during processing the result of p4 change -o, p4 change -i is already submitted 
to the Perforce server, so I guess, there is some rejection from the Perforce 
server, which we can't see in the output.

creator: jens.vdfecht@gmx.de
text:
The Java environment used is J2SDK 1.4.2_03.
Thanks

creator: antoine@apache.org
text:
You need to upgrade to ant 1.6.0 or 1.6.1 or to downgrade to ant 1.6.1.
Cheers,
Antoine

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 18956 ***
